title: Amy Had To Sign ‘Sex-Ed’ Permission Slip for Her Daughter + What’s the Haps: Bobby Had Best Time at the Arkansas Game  + Song Lyrics We’d Get Tattooed
itunes:title: Amy Had To Sign ‘Sex-Ed’ Permission Slip for Her Daughter + What’s the Haps: Bobby Had Best Time at the Arkansas Game  + Song Lyrics We’d Get Tattooed
description:
Amy shares the story behind the permission slip she had to sign for her daughter that she wasn’t expecting. We share stories from our weekend. Bobby had the best day ever seeing Arkansas beat Texas over the weekend. We each share what song lyrics we would get tattooed on our bodies and where. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
